channel.title: MeepJ
channel.description:
Removed all the torches in and around our base, including my desert temple revamp which was 3 stacks alone of torches to light that place up.
well pics are below, some of the areas he removed the torches. Now I know why people hate his ass...
Update, he also changed every sign, removed those since some were pretty offensive
